title: Pirate Ryze CTRL+1 bugged

embed.description: League of Legends Pirate Ryze Skin Spotlight. Shows off Animations and Ability Effects of Ryze on their Pirate Skin in this Spotlight. All footage was taken in game.

body: It works the same way ingame as in this video. Doesn't look like it's intended. Also Ryze sometimes can't reuse it right after the previous joke.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! We're looking into it! {{champion:99}}
I just purchased this skin and this bug is really upsetting...I also hoped to use it as a spam emote as well but cant do that either.Please work on a fix asap
"Thanks for the report! We're looking into it! " that was 4 months ago...any update lol?
Sorry, this isn't something my team personally handles, and I'd passed it on to the team who would be resolving this. I can poke them again about it.
Thanks i think its a bug and i have a Reddit thread and tons of people agree. Intentional or not it looks very buggy.
The lack of spam may be intended, but I'd be happy to follow up again to see what the status of the issue is. :)
